biotools.summary: TrioCNV2 is a tool designed to jointly detecting copy number variations from WGS data of the parent-offspring trio. TrioCNV2 first makes use of the read depth and discordant read pairs to infer approximate locations of copy number variations, and then employs the split read and local de novo assembly approach to refine the breakpoints.

bioschemas.name: TrioCNV2
